channel.title: Best server <3 join us
channel.description:
Hey Guys.., This Is My New Server Bl1tz Scape!!!!v1.. This Is Gonna Look Alot Like CripScape Cuz This Server Is Based On It., Ok So Don't Freak Out On Me,Flame Or Spam Me. I Will Get To The Credits After The Pics And Features...
Features!! -Working Jad Minigame!!! -Working ::Barrows And ::NotedBarrows -Full Working Training Area And Shops -DragonPking Area Its Training/Pk NO TEAMING! -Working Jad Pits -There Is A PkBox..., Plz Don't Team!! -There is A Tab That Says Multi That Just Takes U To A Bar.. -Also There Is Edge Pking.., 1v1 The Only Place Where There Is No Teaming Is At ::Mb Or Around There
working dbow spec [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/9824/dbowspeclz8.png[/img][/url]
new 1vs1 pking spot [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/7464/new1v1pklw0.png[/img][/url] [code] Pkbox and 1vs1 pk is 1 huge room split into two pking spots.. west side is 1v1 pk and eastt side is no rules pking..in the middle are banks (which is a safe zone)[/code] new pkbox [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img357.imageshack.us/img357/9760/newpkboxfi3.png[/img][/url]
working godsword specials [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/4653/workinggsspecmv8.png[/img][/url]
working barrage specials [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/473/workingbaragezy9.png[/img][/url][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 12:42:38 pm[/size][hr][center][b]Pictures 2[/b] Sorry for the small pictures..click on them to enlarge[/center]
New Home [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/7279/newhomeot9.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img165/newhomeot9.png/1/"][img]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/newhomeot9.png/1/w510.png[/img][/url]
Training Area(I didnt edit this place much..all i did was put a talking npc there, banks and a couple KBD's..this will definetly be changed in v2) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/5783/trainvj6.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img257/trainvj6.png/1/"][img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/trainvj6.png/1/w512.png[/img][/url]
New Skill training area (every skill works !! except prayer..which is a mod+ skill - makes it easier to recognize staff) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/5001/newskillvl4.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img297/newskillvl4.png/1/"][img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/newskillvl4.png/1/w509.png[/img][/url]

@destructorltu wrote:

Hey Guys…, This Is My New Server Bl1tz Scape!!!v1… This Is Gonna Look Alot Like CripScape Cuz This Server Is Based On It., Ok So Don’t Freak Out On Me,Flame Or Spam Me. I Will Get To The Credits After The Pics And Features…

                                           Features!!
                       -Working Jad Minigame!!!
                   -Working ::Barrows And ::NotedBarrows
                     -Full Working Training Area And Shops
                         -DragonPking Area Its Training/Pk NO TEAMING!
                                 -Working Jad Pits 
                        -There Is A PkBox..., Plz Don't Team!!
          -There is A Tab That Says Multi That Just Takes U To A Bar.. 
               -Also There Is Edge Pking.., 1v1
      The Only Place Where There Is No Teaming Is At ::Mb Or Around There 

                             working dbow spec

new 1vs1 pking spot

 Pkbox and 1vs1 pk is 1 huge room split into two pking spots.. west side is 1v1 pk and eastt side is no rules pking..in the middle are banks (which is a safe zone)

new pkbox

working godsword specials
